title: I'm getting bugsplatted
body: as soon as I lunch my client the bugsplatt notification pops up. Not only that, it continues to restart the launcher and makes more bugsplatt page. and its all happening on the login screen plz help T^T

replies.body: @porocles I got helped by Corndog.. and he gave me the old client link.. I redownloaded the old client, upgraded the client... updated the new client and everything is fine with Discord overlays :^)
This should be resolved by disabling Discord Overlays!  Let me know if that works for you.
